0.name: JUMPING JACKS
0.description: Start with your feet together and your arms by your sides, then jump up with your feet apart and your hands overhead. Return to the start position then do the next step. This exercise provides a full-body workout and works all your large muscle groups.

1.name: ABDOMINAL CRUNCHES
1.description: Lie on your back with your knees bent and your arms stretched forward. Then lift your upper body off the floor. Hold for a few seconds and slowly return. It primarily works the rectus abdominis muscle and the obliques.

2.name: RUSSIAN TWIST
2.description: Sit on the floor with your knees bent, feel lifted a little bit and back tilted backwards. Then hold your hands together and twist from side to side.

3.name: MOUNTAIN CLIMBER
3.description: Start in the push-up position. Bend your right knee towards your chest and keep your left leg straight, then quickly switch from one leg to the other. This exercise strengthens multiple muscle groups.

4.name: MOUNTAIN CLIMBER
4.description: Start in the push-up position. Bend your right knee towards your chest and keep your left leg straight, then quickly switch from one leg to the other. This exercise strengthens multiple muscle groups.

5.name: HEEL TOUCH
5.description: Lie on the ground with your legs bent and your arms by your sides. Slightly lift your upper body off the floor and make your hands alternately reach your heels.

6.name: LEG RAISES
6.description: Lie down on your back, and put your hands beneath your hips for support. Then lift your legs up until they form a right angle with the floor. Slowly bring your legs back down and repeat the exercise.

7.name: PLANK
7.description: Lie on the floor with your toes and forearms on the ground. Keep your body straight and hold this position as long as you can. This exercise strengthens the abdomen back and shoulders.

8.name: COBRA STRETCH
8.description: Lie down on your stomach and bend your elbows with your hands beneath your shoulders. Then push your chest up off the ground as far as possible. Hold this position for seconds.

9.name: SPINE LUMBAR TWIST STRETCH LEFT
9.description: Lie on your back with your legs extended. Lift your left leg up and use your right hand to pull your left knee to the right, but keep your other arm extended to the side on the floor. Hold this position for a few seconds.

10.name: SPINE LUMBAR TWIST STRETCH RIGHT
10.description: Lie on your back with your legs extended. Lift your right leg up and use your left hand to pull your right knee to the left, but keep your other arm extended to the side on the floor. Hold this position for a few seconds.

11.name: HEEL TOUCH
11.description: Lie on the ground with your legs bent and your arms by your sides. Slightly lift your upper body off the floor and make your hands alternately reach your heels.

12.name: CROSSOVER CRUNCH
12.description: Lie on your back with your knees bent and your hands behind your ears. Raise and twist your torso so your right elbow moves to meet your left knee. Repeat with the other side.

13.name: SIDE BRIDGES LEFT
13.description: Lie on your right side. Put your right elbow directly under your shoulders and put your left hand on your waist. Place your left leg on your right leg. Raise your hips upward, hold for 2-4 seconds, then go back to the start position. Repeat this exercise.

14.name: SIDE BRIDGES RIGHT
14.description: Lie on your right side. Put your right elbow directly under your shoulders and put your left hand on your waist. Place your left leg on your right leg. Raise your hips upward, hold for 2-4 seconds, then go back to the start position. Repeat this exercise.

15.name: BICYCLE CRUNCHES
15.description: Lie on the floor with your hands behind your ears. Raise your knees and close your right elbow toward your left knee, then close your left elbow toward your right knee. Repeat the exercise.
